titles.title: Royalty Distribution Clarification Act of 2006
To amend title 17, United States Code, to provide for the partial distribution of royalty fees in certain circumstances.
Royalty Distribution Clarification Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Royalty Distribution Clarification Act of 2006 - Allows Copyright Royalty Judges, upon the motion of a claimant and after publication of a request for responses, to make a partial distribution of cable and satellite royalty fees at any time after the filing of claims for distribution if no eligible claimant has stated a reasonable objection. (Current law authorizes a partial distribution during the pendency of a distribution proceeding.)
